original_text: After that, while Abijah was Judah's king, Jeroboam never became strong again. Finally, the Lord punished Jeroboam so that he died.
korean_text: 아비야 때에 여로보암이 다시 강성하지 못하고 여호와의 치심을 입어 죽었고

sentences.original_text: After that, while Abijah was Judah's king
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에, 아비야가 유다의 왕이 되었을 때
